group_1.textRight: Mami, you didn't do anything wrong.@I'll erase the pain for you.
[flashEffect:flashWhite2]All you need to think about is salvation.
How do you feel?

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle*
I feel like I have just awoken.
How could I ever doubt...?
Even the act of sacrifice is made noble by@a lofty goal such as ours.
...They're gone. You can come out now.

group_1.textRight: What the HELL was that just now?!

group_1.textLeft: They strengthened her brainwashing using an@Uwasa...is how I'd put it.

group_1.textRight: Brainwashing...

group_1.textLeft: I'm so sorry.
I'm sure it feels awful to see a friend go@through something like that.
But that's how the Wings of the Magius@operates, I'm afraid.

group_1.textRight: We aren't friends.
(Damn it... Why'd I lose my cool? That's not@like me.)

group_1.textLeft: Ah, I see.

group_1.textRight: Anyway, why did you even show me somethin'@like that?
You'd scare off lesser girls doing that kinda@thing.

group_1.textLeft: I want to scare you off.
The Magius have gone too far.
I can't let any more girls get dragged into@this.
You though... It doesn't seem like you came@to us for solace.

group_1.textRight: (Is she trying to grill me? Nah, I don't@get that vibe at all.)
Well, ya know. I came here plannin' to@feel out what you guys were up to.

group_1.textLeft: And how did it go?

group_1.textRight: Well, havin' just seen that little scene...
I'd have to be a total nutjob to want to@join up with the Wings of the Magius.
So I'll pass.

group_1.textLeft: In that case, I have one more thing I'd@like to show you.
Come with me.

group_1.textRight: Is this...a Witch?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know, exactly...
The Magius call it "Eve".
They claim it's proof that Magical Girls@will be freed.
And now, in order to hatch Eve...
They are summoning [textRed:Walpurgisnacht] to@Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: [chara:200601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Seriously?! [chara:200601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:200601:cheek_0][chara:200601:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:200601:lipSynch_1]Are they nuts?!

group_1.textLeft: I think they lost sight of what matters@mostâ€¦
All in pursuit of their goals.

group_1.textRight: Well that's a load.
What're you gonna do now?

group_1.textLeft: Hm?

group_1.textRight: You just showed me this Eve thing.
That must mean you're not super keen on@the Magius, right?
If you're gonna turn tail and run, mind if I @stick with you until we get out?
I don't know this area so well.

group_1.textLeft: I can't run.
I need to pay penance for everything that@I've done.
I'm going to stay here and make the Magius@mend their ways.

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah?
So you're the kinda chick who cleans up@after her own mess.
I can respect that.

group_1.textLeft: I'll help you get outside. It's easy to get@lost if you don't know the layout.
Now just make your way out of the forest@and you'll arrive in Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: I owe ya one. Thanks.

group_1.textLeft: No... This is the very least I could do.

group_1.textRight: See ya.

group_1.textCenter: ...[wait:1.5][chara:100601:cheek_0][chara:100601:lipSynch_1]Perhaps I should've given her my will.
(It'd be a pain to have 'em out lookin' for@me. Guess I'll leave Kamihama for now.)

group_1.textLeft: By the way, what happened with the other@Mitakihara Magical Girls?
You didn't simply leave them, did you?

group_1.textRight: Of course not.
I locked them up so they won't be able@to leave Mitakihara City.

group_1.textCenter: Suppose I could drop by Mitakihara.
I did tell those guys we would share intel,@after all.
